about_the_game:
The Fight'N Rage Original Soundtrack Gold Edition includes:
• Fully remastered original 2-disc album (in 24-bit FLAC and MP3 formats)
• New orchestral arrangements of "Destiny" and "Morning Sunlight"
• "Fight'N Rage: Guitar Transcriptions" book (PDFs in English and Spanish)
• "Fight'N Rage: Bass Transcriptions" book (PDFs in English and Spanish)
• "Fight'N Rage: Drum Transcriptions" book (PDFs in English and Spanish)
• Soundtrack and transcription book covers (featuring a new illustration by Sebastián García)

reviews:
“A shout-out must also be given to a blistering soundtrack by Gonzalo Varela that includes over forty (!) tracks to accompany the on-screen carnage that veer between the guitar-heavy rock riffs you’d expect of this type of game to some superbly atmospheric – and totally unexpected – jazz and funk.”
Nintendo Life

“(...) excellent soundtrack (...).”

“(...) an excellent Guilty Gear-esque metal soundtrack that keeps everything feeling badass.”

short_description: A Fight'N Rage Original Soundtrack Special Edition package that includes the fully remastered original 2-disc album, two new orchestral arrangements, and guitar, bass and drum digital transcription books featuring all the music from the game.
